titlestmt.titleproper: Governor Sidney P. Osborn: the Record of a Final Dramatic Illness 1947-1954
Governor Sidney P. Osborn: the Record of a Final Dramatic Illness

change.item: This finding aid was manually revised and updated to EAD 2.0 specifications by Sara Filion

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Governor Sidney P. Osborn: the Record of a Final Dramatic Illness 1947-1954
did.abstract: Materials include original typescript, with holograph footnotes and minor editing, 1954. The collection follows Osborns last two years in office, 1946-1948. Also includes photographs of Osborn and other Arizona politicians, clippings, and related material.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Governor Sidney P. Osborn: the Record of a Final Dramatic Illness (AZ 195). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Newspaperman; managing editor of the Arizona Times, Phoenix, Ariz., 1946-1948, later executive editor, Arizona Daily Star.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Original typescript, with holograph footnotes and minor editing, 1954. Follows Osborns last two years in office, 1946-1948. Accompanied by photographs of Osborn and other Arizona politicians, clippings, and related material.
